title: How is this even chat bannable

replies.body: From what I can tell, Rank shaming and 2 swear words.
didn't know rank shaming was a thing considering rank is your skill level q-q

There's a difference between stating someone's rank as a metric of skill and using it to try and deny them the right to speak or make decisions, or generally use it as an insult. But like I said, without the full log we only have hints towards the behaviour involved in the punishment.

There's not much context players here on boards can give you without your whole chat log, but if you wish to appeal a punishment you can do so through player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Thats what i got when going through the player support, somehow that is what got me banned :(

Support will sometimes offer examples of problematic behaviour, but that doesn't make it a list of all the things that resulted in your punishment, such is the point of an example. There is also absolutely zero context to that chat, so we have no way of knowing what the support agent was referencing, or why those lines in particular were brought up.

Without the context of the log, the ticket, your punishment history etc, there isn't much we can tell you.
i have my chatlogs from riot, don't know the best way to show it
the way they send it is with the chat encoding so its like 13,000 digits

I'd recommend asking support for more context around this punishment. Oftentimes logs like there are presented for punishments resulting from long but more minor negative history, the straw that broke the camels back if you will. Assuming that's the whole log there's very likely more to the story than just that one game, and support should be able to give you that context.
copy paste the chat log from riot, so i will go about asking for more context ty.
